Name: SFN
ToolTip: System Frame Number, Value: 0-1023

Name: Slot
ToolTip: Value: 0-319

Name: nPDUs
ToolTip: Number of PDUs that are included in this message. All PDUs in the message are numbered in order. Value 0-255

Name: nGroup
ToolTip: Number of UE Groups included in this message. Value 0-255

Name: PDUType
ToolTip: 0: PDCCH, 1: PDSCH,  2: CSI-RS, 3: SSB

Name: PDUSize
ToolTip: Size of the PDU control information (in bytes). This length value includes the 4 bytes required for the PDU type and PDU size parameters.

Name: physCellId
ToolTip: Physical cell ID. Value: 0-1007

Name: betaPss
ToolTip: PSS EPRE to SSS EPRE in a SS/PBCH block. Values: 0 = 0dB, 1 = 3dB

Name: ssbBlockIndex
ToolTip: SS/PBCH block index within a SSB burst set. Required for PBCH DMRS scrambling. Value: 0-63 (Lmax)

Name: ssbSubcarrierOffset
ToolTip: ssbSubcarrierOffset. Value: 0-31

Name: SsbOffsetPointA
ToolTip: Offset of lowest subcarrier of lowest resource block used for SS/PBCH block. Value: 0-2199

Name: bchPayloadFlag
ToolTip: A value indicating how the BCH payload is generated. This should match the PARAM/CONFIG TLVs. Value: 0: MAC generates the full PBCH payload, 1: PHY generates the timing PBCH bits 2: PHY generates the full PBCH payload

Name: bchPayload
ToolTip: BCH payload. The valid bits are indicated in the PARAM/CONFIG TLVs. If PARAM/CONFIG TLVs indicate MAC generates full bchPayload then the payload length is 31 bits with the 8 LSB bits being (SFN, half-radio frame bit, SS/PBCH block idx) [TS38.212 sec 7.1.1] Otherwise timing PBCH bits are generated by the PHY. And for bchPayload the 24 LSB are used.

Name: numPRGs
ToolTip: Number of PRGs spanning this allocation. Value : 1-275

Name: prgSize
ToolTip: Size in RBs of a precoding resource block group (PRG) â€“ to which same precoding and digital beamforming gets applied. Value: 1-275

Name: digBFInterfaces
ToolTip: Number of STD ant ports (parallel streams) feeding into the digBF Value: 0-255

Name: PMidx
ToolTip: Index to precoding matrix (PM) pre-stored at cell configuration. Note: If precoding is not used this parameter should be set to 0. Value: 0-65535.

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535

Name: beamIdx
ToolTip: Index of the digital beam weight vector pre-stored at cell configuration. The vector maps this input port to output TXRUs. Value: 0-65535
